   22: -module(ssl_crl_SUITE).

   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).

   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Common test
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_suite/1,
   36:          end_per_group/2,
   37:          end_per_testcase/2
   38:         ]).
   39: 
   40: 
   41: %% Test cases
   42: -export([crl_verify_valid/0,
   43:          crl_verify_valid/1,
   44:          crl_verify_revoked/0,
   45:          crl_verify_revoked/1,
   46:          crl_verify_valid_derCAs/0,
   47:          crl_verify_valid_derCAs/1,
   48:          crl_verify_revoked_derCAs/0,
   49:          crl_verify_revoked_derCAs/1,
   50:          crl_verify_no_crl/0,
   51:          crl_verify_no_crl/1,
   52:          crl_hash_dir_collision/0,
   53:          crl_hash_dir_collision/1,
   54:          crl_hash_dir_expired/0,
   55:          crl_hash_dir_expired/1,
   56:          delete_crl_with_path/1]).
   57: 
   58: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 30}).
   59: 
   60: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: all() -> 
   64:     [
   65:      {group, check_true},
   66:      {group, check_peer},
   67:      {group, check_best_effort}
   68:     ].
   69: 
   70: groups() ->
   71:     [
   72:      {check_true, [],  [{group, v2_crl},
   73: 			{group, v1_crl},
   74: 			{group, idp_crl},
   75:                         {group, crl_hash_dir},
   76:                         {group, crl_verify_crldp_crlissuer}]},
   77:      {check_peer, [],   [{group, v2_crl},
   78: 			 {group, v1_crl},
   79: 			 {group, idp_crl},
   80:                          {group, crl_hash_dir}]},
   81:      {check_best_effort, [], [{group, v2_crl},
   82: 			       {group, v1_crl},
   83: 			      {group, idp_crl},
   84: 			      {group, crl_hash_dir}]},
   85:      {v2_crl,  [], basic_tests()},
   86:      {v1_crl,  [], basic_tests()},
   87:      {idp_crl, [], basic_tests() ++ idp_crl_tests()},
   88:      {crl_hash_dir, [], basic_tests() ++ crl_hash_dir_tests()},
   89:      {crl_verify_crldp_crlissuer, [], [crl_verify_valid]}].
   90: 
   91: basic_tests() ->
   92:     [crl_verify_valid,
   93:      crl_verify_revoked,
   94:      crl_verify_valid_derCAs,
   95:      crl_verify_revoked_derCAs,
   96:      crl_verify_no_crl].
   97: 
   98: idp_crl_tests() ->
   99:     [delete_crl_with_path].
  100: 
  101: crl_hash_dir_tests() ->
  102:     [crl_hash_dir_collision, crl_hash_dir_expired].
  103: 
  104: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  105:     case os:find_executable("openssl") of
  106: 	false ->
  107: 	    {skip, "Openssl not found"};
  108: 	_ ->
  109: 	    OpenSSL_version = (catch os:cmd("openssl version")),
  110: 	    case ssl_test_lib:enough_openssl_crl_support(OpenSSL_version) of
  111: 		false ->
  112: 		    {skip, io_lib:format("Bad openssl version: ~p",[OpenSSL_version])};
  113: 		_ ->
  114: 		    end_per_suite(Config),
  115: 		    try application:start(crypto) of
  116: 			ok ->
  117: 			    {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
  118: 			    IPfamily =
  119: 				case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts,[])) of
  120: 				    true -> inet6;
  121: 				    false -> inet
  122: 				end,
  123: 			    [{ipfamily,IPfamily}, {openssl_version,OpenSSL_version} | Config]
  124: 		    catch _:_ ->
  125: 			    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  126: 		    end
  127: 	    end
  128:     end.
  129: 
  130: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  131:     ssl:stop(),
  132:     application:stop(crypto).
  133: 
  134: init_per_group(check_true, Config) ->
  135:     [{crl_check, true} | Config];
  136: init_per_group(check_peer, Config) ->
  137:     [{crl_check, peer} | Config];
  138: init_per_group(check_best_effort, Config) ->
  139:     [{crl_check, best_effort} | Config];
  140: init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  141:     try 
  142: 	case is_idp(Group) of
  143: 	    true ->
  144: 		[{idp_crl, true} | Config0];
  145: 	    false ->
  146: 		DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config0), 
  147: 		CertDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0), Group),
  148: 		{CertOpts, Config} = init_certs(CertDir, Group, Config0),
  149: 		{ok, _} =  make_certs:all(DataDir, CertDir, CertOpts),
  150: 		CrlCacheOpts = case need_hash_dir(Group) of
  151: 				   true ->
  152: 				       CrlDir = filename:join(CertDir, "crls"),
  153: 				       %% Copy CRLs to their hashed filenames.
  154: 				       %% Find the hashes with 'openssl crl -noout -hash -in crl.pem'.
  155: 				       populate_crl_hash_dir(CertDir, CrlDir,
  156: 							     [{"erlangCA", "d6134ed3"},
  157: 							      {"otpCA", "d4c8d7e5"}],
  158: 							     replace),
  159: 				       [{crl_cache,
  160: 					 {ssl_crl_hash_dir,
  161: 					  {internal, [{dir, CrlDir}]}}}];
  162: 				   _ ->
  163: 				       []
  164: 			       end,
  165: 		[{crl_cache_opts, CrlCacheOpts},
  166: 		 {cert_dir, CertDir},
  167: 		 {idp_crl, false} | Config]
  168: 	end
  169:     catch
  170: 	_:_ ->
  171: 	    {skip, "Unable to create crls"}
  172:     end.
  173: 
  174: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  175:     
  176:     Config.
  177: 
  178: init_per_testcase(Case, Config0) ->
  179:     case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config0) of
  180: 	true ->
  181: 	    end_per_testcase(Case, Config0),
  182: 	    inets:start(),
  183: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  184: 	    ServerRoot = make_dir_path([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0), idp_crl, tmp]),
  185: 	    %% start a HTTP server to serve the CRLs
  186: 	    {ok, Httpd} = inets:start(httpd, [{ipfamily, proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config0)},
  187: 					      {server_name, "localhost"}, {port, 0},
  188: 					      {server_root, ServerRoot},
  189: 					      {document_root, 
  190: 					       filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0), idp_crl)}
  191: 					     ]),
  192: 	    [{port,Port}] = httpd:info(Httpd, [port]),
  193: 	    Config = [{httpd_port, Port} | Config0],
  194: 	    DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), 
  195: 	    CertDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0), idp_crl),
  196: 	    {CertOpts, Config} = init_certs(CertDir, idp_crl, Config),
  197: 	    case make_certs:all(DataDir, CertDir, CertOpts) of
  198:                 {ok, _} ->
  199:                     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  200:                     [{cert_dir, CertDir} | Config];
  201:                 _ ->
  202:                     end_per_testcase(Case, Config0),
  203:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  204:                     {skip, "Unable to create IDP crls"}
  205:             end;
  206: 	false ->
  207: 	    end_per_testcase(Case, Config0),
  208: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  209: 	    Config0
  210:     end.
  211: 
  212: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  213:     case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config) of
  214: 	true ->
  215: 	    ssl:stop(),
  216: 	    inets:stop();
  217: 	false ->
  218: 	    ssl:stop()
  219:     end.
  220: 
  221: %%%================================================================
  222: %%% Test cases
  223: %%%================================================================
  224: 
  225: crl_verify_valid() ->
  226:     [{doc,"Verify a simple valid CRL chain"}].
  227: crl_verify_valid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  229:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  230:     ServerOpts =  [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "key.pem"])},
  231:       		  {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cert.pem"])},
  232: 		   {cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"])}],
  233:     ClientOpts =  case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config) of 
  234: 		      true ->	       
  235: 			  [{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "client", "cacerts.pem"])},
  236: 			   {crl_check, Check},
  237: 			   {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}},
  238: 			   {verify, verify_peer}];
  239: 		      false ->
  240: 			  proplists:get_value(crl_cache_opts, Config) ++
  241: 			      [{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "client", "cacerts.pem"])},
  242: 			       {crl_check, Check},
  243: 			       {verify, verify_peer}]
  244: 		  end,			  
  245:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  246: 
  247:     ssl_crl_cache:insert("http://localhost/erlangCA/crl.pem", {file, filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  248:     ssl_crl_cache:insert("http://localhost/otpCA/crl.pem", {file, filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  249:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  250:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  251: 
  252:     crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts),
  253: 
  254:     %% check that delete WITH URI works as well.
  255:     ssl_crl_cache:delete("http://localhost/erlangCA/crl.pem").
  256: 
  257: crl_verify_revoked() ->
  258:     [{doc,"Verify a simple CRL chain when peer cert is reveoked"}].
  259: crl_verify_revoked(Config)  when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  261:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  262:     ServerOpts = [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "key.pem"])},
  263:       		  {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "cert.pem"])},
  264:       		  {cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "cacerts.pem"])}],
  265: 
  266:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  267: 
  268:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  269:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  270:     
  271:     ClientOpts =  case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config) of 
  272: 		      true ->	       
  273: 			  [{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "cacerts.pem"])},
  274: 			   {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}},
  275: 			   {crl_check, Check},
  276: 			   {verify, verify_peer}];
  277: 		      false ->
  278: 			  proplists:get_value(crl_cache_opts, Config) ++
  279: 			      [{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "cacerts.pem"])},
  280: 			       {crl_check, Check},
  281: 			       {verify, verify_peer}]
  282: 		  end,	
  283:     
  284:     crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  285:                      certificate_revoked).
  286: crl_verify_valid_derCAs() ->
  287:     [{doc,"Verify a simple valid CRL chain"}].
  288: crl_verify_valid_derCAs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  289:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  290:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  291: 
  292:     CaCerts = der_cas(filename:join([PrivDir, "client", "cacerts.pem"])),
  293: 
  294:     ServerOpts =  [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "key.pem"])},
  295:                    {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cert.pem"])},
  296:                    {cacerts, der_cas(filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"]))}
  297:                   ],
  298:     ClientOpts =  case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config) of
  299: 		      true ->
  300: 			  [{cacerts, CaCerts},
  301: 			   {crl_check, Check},
  302: 			   {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}},
  303: 			   {verify, verify_peer}];
  304: 		      false ->
  305: 			  proplists:get_value(crl_cache_opts, Config) ++
  306: 			      [{cacerts, CaCerts},
  307: 			       {crl_check, Check},
  308: 			       {verify, verify_peer}]
  309: 		  end,
  310:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  311: 
  312:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  313:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  314: 
  315:     crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts).
  316: 
  317: crl_verify_revoked_derCAs() ->
  318:     [{doc,"Verify a simple CRL chain when peer cert is reveoked"}].
  319: crl_verify_revoked_derCAs(Config)  when is_list(Config) ->
  320:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  321:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  322: 
  323:     CaCerts = der_cas(filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "cacerts.pem"])),
  324: 
  325:     ServerOpts = [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "key.pem"])},
  326: 		  {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "revoked", "cert.pem"])},
  327: 		  {cacerts,  der_cas(filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"]))}],
  328: 
  329:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  330: 
  331:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  332:     ssl_crl_cache:insert({file, filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"])}),
  333: 
  334:     ClientOpts =  case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config) of
  335: 		      true ->
  336: 			  [{cacerts, CaCerts},
  337: 			   {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}},
  338: 			   {crl_check, Check},
  339: 			   {verify, verify_peer}];
  340: 		      false ->
  341: 			  proplists:get_value(crl_cache_opts, Config) ++
  342: 			      [{cacerts, CaCerts},
  343: 			       {crl_check, Check},
  344: 			       {verify, verify_peer}]
  345: 		  end,
  346: 
  347:     crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  348:                      certificate_revoked).
  349: 
  350: crl_verify_no_crl() ->
  351:     [{doc,"Verify a simple CRL chain when the CRL is missing"}].
  352: crl_verify_no_crl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  353:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  354:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  355: 
  356:     ServerOpts =  [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "key.pem"])},
  357:                    {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cert.pem"])},
  358: 		   {cacertfile,  filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"])}],
  359:     ClientOpts =  case proplists:get_value(idp_crl, Config) of 
  360: 		      true ->	       
  361: 			  [{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"])},
  362: 			   {crl_check, Check},
  363: 			   {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}},
  364: 			   {verify, verify_peer}];
  365: 		      false ->
  366: 			  [{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"])},
  367: 			   {crl_check, Check},
  368: 			   {verify, verify_peer}]
  369: 		  end,			  
  370:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  371: 
  372:     %% In case we're running an HTTP server that serves CRLs, let's
  373:     %% rename those files, so the CRL is absent when we try to verify
  374:     %% it.
  375:     %%
  376:     %% If we're not using an HTTP server, we just need to refrain from
  377:     %% adding the CRLs to the cache manually.
  378:     rename_crl(filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "crl.pem"])),
  379:     rename_crl(filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"])),
  380: 
  381:     %% The expected outcome when the CRL is missing depends on the
  382:     %% crl_check setting.
  383:     case Check of
  384:         true ->
  385:             %% The error "revocation status undetermined" gets turned
  386:             %% into "bad certificate".
  387:             crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  388:                              bad_certificate);
  389:         peer ->
  390:             crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  391:                              bad_certificate);
  392:         best_effort ->
  393:             %% In "best effort" mode, we consider the certificate not
  394:             %% to be revoked if we can't find the appropriate CRL.
  395:             crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts)
  396:     end.
  397: 
  398: crl_hash_dir_collision() ->
  399:     [{doc,"Verify ssl_crl_hash_dir behaviour with hash collisions"}].
  400: crl_hash_dir_collision(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  401:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  402:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  403: 
  404:     %% Create two CAs whose names hash to the same value
  405:     CA1 = "hash-collision-0000000000",
  406:     CA2 = "hash-collision-0258497583",
  407:     CertsConfig = make_certs:make_config([]),
  408:     make_certs:intermediateCA(PrivDir, CA1, "erlangCA", CertsConfig),
  409:     make_certs:intermediateCA(PrivDir, CA2, "erlangCA", CertsConfig),
  410: 
  411:     make_certs:enduser(PrivDir, CA1, "collision-client-1", CertsConfig),
  412:     make_certs:enduser(PrivDir, CA2, "collision-client-2", CertsConfig),
  413: 
  414:     [ServerOpts1, ServerOpts2] =
  415: 	[
  416: 	 [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, EndUser, "key.pem"])},
  417: 	  {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, EndUser, "cert.pem"])},
  418: 	  {cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, EndUser, "cacerts.pem"])}]
  419: 	 || EndUser <- ["collision-client-1", "collision-client-2"]],
  420: 
  421:     %% Add CRLs for our new CAs into the CRL hash directory.
  422:     %% Find the hashes with 'openssl crl -noout -hash -in crl.pem'.
  423:     CrlDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "crls"),
  424:     populate_crl_hash_dir(PrivDir, CrlDir,
  425: 			  [{CA1, "b68fc624"},
  426: 			   {CA2, "b68fc624"}],
  427: 			 replace),
  428: 
  429:     NewCA = new_ca(filename:join([PrivDir, "new_ca"]),
  430: 		   filename:join([PrivDir, "erlangCA", "cacerts.pem"]),
  431: 		   filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cacerts.pem"])),
  432:     
  433:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(crl_cache_opts, Config) ++
  434: 	[{cacertfile, NewCA},
  435: 	 {crl_check, Check},
  436: 	 {verify, verify_peer}],
  437:     
  438:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  439:     
  440:     %% Neither certificate revoked; both succeed.
  441:     crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts1, ClientNode, ClientOpts),
  442:     crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts2, ClientNode, ClientOpts),
  443: 
  444:     make_certs:revoke(PrivDir, CA1, "collision-client-1", CertsConfig),
  445:     populate_crl_hash_dir(PrivDir, CrlDir,
  446: 			  [{CA1, "b68fc624"},
  447: 			   {CA2, "b68fc624"}],
  448: 			 replace),
  449: 
  450:     %% First certificate revoked; first fails, second succeeds.
  451:     crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts1, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  452:                      certificate_revoked),
  453:     crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts2, ClientNode, ClientOpts),
  454: 
  455:     make_certs:revoke(PrivDir, CA2, "collision-client-2", CertsConfig),
  456:     populate_crl_hash_dir(PrivDir, CrlDir,
  457: 			  [{CA1, "b68fc624"},
  458: 			   {CA2, "b68fc624"}],
  459: 			 replace),
  460: 
  461:     %% Second certificate revoked; both fail.
  462:     crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts1, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  463:                      certificate_revoked),
  464:     crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts2, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  465:                      certificate_revoked),
  466: 
  467:     ok.
  468: 
  469: crl_hash_dir_expired() ->
  470:     [{doc,"Verify ssl_crl_hash_dir behaviour with expired CRLs"}].
  471: crl_hash_dir_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  473:     Check = proplists:get_value(crl_check, Config),
  474: 
  475:     CA = "CRL-maybe-expired-CA",
  476:     %% Add "issuing distribution point", to ensure that verification
  477:     %% fails if there is no valid CRL.
  478:     CertsConfig = make_certs:make_config([{issuing_distribution_point, true}]),
  479:     make_certs:can_generate_expired_crls(CertsConfig)
  480:     	orelse throw({skip, "cannot generate CRLs with expiry date in the past"}),
  481:     make_certs:intermediateCA(PrivDir, CA, "erlangCA", CertsConfig),
  482:     EndUser = "CRL-maybe-expired",
  483:     make_certs:enduser(PrivDir, CA, EndUser, CertsConfig),
  484: 
  485:     ServerOpts =  [{keyfile, filename:join([PrivDir, EndUser, "key.pem"])},
  486: 		   {certfile, filename:join([PrivDir, EndUser, "cert.pem"])},
  487: 		   {cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, EndUser, "cacerts.pem"])}],
  488:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(crl_cache_opts, Config) ++
  489: 	[{cacertfile, filename:join([PrivDir, CA, "cacerts.pem"])},
  490: 	 {crl_check, Check},
  491: 	 {verify, verify_peer}],
  492:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  493: 
  494:     %% First make a CRL that will expire in one second.
  495:     make_certs:gencrl_sec(PrivDir, CA, CertsConfig, 1),
  496:     %% Sleep until the next CRL is due
  497:     ct:sleep({seconds, 1}),
  498: 
  499:     CrlDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "crls"),
  500:     populate_crl_hash_dir(PrivDir, CrlDir,
  501: 			  [{CA, "1627b4b0"}],
  502: 			  replace),
  503: 
  504:     %% Since the CRL has expired, it's treated as missing, and the
  505:     %% outcome depends on the crl_check setting.
  506:     case Check of
  507:         true ->
  508:             %% The error "revocation status undetermined" gets turned
  509:             %% into "bad certificate".
  510:             crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  511:                              bad_certificate);
  512:         peer ->
  513:             crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts,
  514:                              bad_certificate);
  515:         best_effort ->
  516:             %% In "best effort" mode, we consider the certificate not
  517:             %% to be revoked if we can't find the appropriate CRL.
  518:             crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts)
  519:     end,
  520: 
  521:     %% Now make a CRL that expires tomorrow.
  522:     make_certs:gencrl(PrivDir, CA, CertsConfig, 24),
  523:     CrlDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "crls"),
  524:     populate_crl_hash_dir(PrivDir, CrlDir,
  525: 			  [{CA, "1627b4b0"}],
  526: 			  add),
  527: 
  528:     %% With a valid CRL, verification should always pass.
  529:     crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts),
  530: 
  531:     ok.
  532: 
  533: crl_verify_valid(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts) ->
  534:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  535: 					{from, self()}, 
  536: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, 
  537: 					       send_recv_result_active, []}},				       
  538: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  539:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
  540:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  541: 					{host, Hostname},
  542: 					{from, self()}, 
  543: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, 
  544: 					       send_recv_result_active, []}},
  545: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
  546:     
  547:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok,  Server, ok),
  548: 
  549:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  550:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  551: 
  552: crl_verify_error(Hostname, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, ExpectedAlert) ->
  553:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  554: 					      {from, self()},
  555: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
  556:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  557: 
  558:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  559: 					      {host, Hostname},
  560: 					      {from, self()},
  561: 					      {options, ClientOpts}]),
  562: 
  563:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, ExpectedAlert).
  564: 
  565: delete_crl_with_path(Config) ->
  566:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(cert_dir, Config),
  567: 
  568:     CertFilepath = filename:join([PrivDir, "server", "cert.pem"]),
  569:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(CertFilepath),
  570:     [{_, DerCert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
  571:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(DerCert, otp),
  572:     [DP | _] = public_key:pkix_dist_points(OTPCert),
  573: 
  574:     CRLFilepath = filename:join([PrivDir, "otpCA", "crl.pem"]),
  575:     {ok, PemBin} = file:read_file(CRLFilepath),
  576:     PemEntries = public_key:pem_decode(PemBin),
  577:     CRLs = [CRL || {'CertificateList', CRL, not_encrypted}
  578:                        <- PemEntries],
  579: 
  580:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
  581:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
  582:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
  583:     case element(5, State) of
  584:         [_, _, _, {CRLCache, _}] ->
  585:             URI = "http://localhost/otpCA/crl.pem",
  586:             not_available = ssl_crl_cache:lookup(DP, issuer, {{CRLCache, unused}, unused}),
  587:             ok = ssl_crl_cache:insert(URI, {der, CRLs}),
  588:             CRLs = ssl_crl_cache:lookup(DP, issuer, {{CRLCache, unused}, unused}),
  589:             ok = ssl_crl_cache:delete(URI),
  590:             not_available = ssl_crl_cache:lookup(DP, issuer, {{CRLCache, unused}, unused}),
  591:             ok
  592:     end.
  593:

  598:     true;

  603:     true;

  605:     true;
  606: need_hash_dir(_) ->
  607:     false.

  609: init_certs(_,v1_crl, Config)  -> 
  610:     {[{v2_crls, false}], Config};
  611: init_certs(_,crl_verify_crldp_crlissuer , Config) ->
  612:     {[{crldp_crlissuer, true}], Config};
  613: init_certs(_, idp_crl, Config) -> 
  614:     Port = proplists:get_value(httpd_port, Config),
  615:     {[{crl_port,Port},
  616:       {issuing_distribution_point, true}], Config
  617:     };

  619:     {[], Config}.

  621: make_dir_path(PathComponents) ->
  622:     lists:foldl(fun(F,P0) -> file:make_dir(P=filename:join(P0,F)), P end,
  623: 		"",
  624: 		PathComponents).
  625: 
  626: rename_crl(Filename) ->
  627:     file:rename(Filename, Filename ++ ".notfound").
  628: 
  629: populate_crl_hash_dir(CertDir, CrlDir, CAsHashes, AddOrReplace) ->
  630:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(filename:join(CrlDir, "crls")),
  631:     case AddOrReplace of
  632: 	replace ->
  633: 	    %% Delete existing files, so we can override them.
  634: 	    [ok = file:delete(FileToDelete) ||
  635: 		{_CA, Hash} <- CAsHashes,
  636: 		FileToDelete <- filelib:wildcard(
  637: 				  filename:join(CrlDir, Hash ++ ".r*"))];
  638: 	add ->
  639: 	    ok
  640:     end,
  641:     %% Create new files, incrementing suffix if needed to find unique names.
  642:     [{ok, _} =
  643: 	 file:copy(filename:join([CertDir, CA, "crl.pem"]),
  644: 		   find_free_name(CrlDir, Hash, 0))
  645:      || {CA, Hash} <- CAsHashes],
  646:     ok.
  647: 
  648: find_free_name(CrlDir, Hash, N) ->
  649:     Name = filename:join(CrlDir, Hash ++ ".r" ++ integer_to_list(N)),
  650:     case filelib:is_file(Name) of
  651: 	true ->
  652: 	    find_free_name(CrlDir, Hash, N + 1);
  653: 	false ->
  654: 	    Name
  655:     end.
  656: 
  657: new_ca(FileName, CA1, CA2) ->
  658:     {ok, P1} = file:read_file(CA1),
  659:     E1 = public_key:pem_decode(P1),
  660:     {ok, P2} = file:read_file(CA2),
  661:     E2 = public_key:pem_decode(P2),
  662:     Pem = public_key:pem_encode(E1 ++E2),
  663:     file:write_file(FileName,  Pem),
  664:     FileName.
  665: 
  666: 
  667: der_cas(CAcertsFile) ->
  668:     {ok, Pem} = file:read_file(CAcertsFile),
  669:     Decoded = public_key:pem_decode(Pem),
  670:     [DER || {_, DER, _} <- Decoded].
